author: jkotas
body: We are removing AssemblyLoadContext.InitializeDefaultContext method from .NET Core v1.0 surface because of it is no longer necessary after we have we have introduced Resolving event, and it is hard to use correctly (https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/pull/8730).

comments.author: jkotas
comments.body: https://github.com/jkotas/PowerShell/commit/c8002dc7e9fa59c51b35e899ff6062decda26db7 is the proposed change, but I am not able to verify that it works. `Start-PSBuild` fails for me with: "Execution of { dotnet restore $RestoreArguments } failed with exit code 1"

title: Switch from AssemblyLoadContext.InitializeDefaultContext to AssemblyLoadContext.Resolving event
